eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A SHELTER IN PLACE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Burke, NC; AT 11:57 AM ON NOV 20, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:57 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A 4-inch gas main has ruptured at 100 Reed Street in Drexel. Shelter-in-place order issued for a 1/4-mile radius around the area. If you live or are working within 1 quarter mile of the area, do not use appliances that create sparks, turn off HVAC units, and remain indoors unti the all clear is given. Notify 911 of emergencies. Stay indoors. Close windows and doors.

Turn off HVAC systems.

Avoid anything that could create a spark.
